{"id":540994398,"lang":"cpp","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1629388345,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/540994398/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Regular Expression Matching","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        int n = s.length(); int m = p.length();\n        vector<vector<bool>> dp(n+1, vector<bool>(m+1, 0));\n        dp[0][0] = true;\n        for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) {\n            dp[0][i] = p[i-1] == '*' && dp[0][i-2];\n        }\n        /*\n        for (auto v : dp) {\n            for (bool b : v) cout << b << ' ';\n            cout << endl;\n        }\n        */\n        for (int s_p = 1; s_p <= n; ++s_p) {\n            for (int p_p = 1; p_p <= m; ++p_p) {\n                if (p[p_p-1] == '.' || s[s_p-1] == p[p_p-1]) {\n                    dp[s_p][p_p] = dp[s_p-1][p_p-1];\n                } else if (p[p_p-1] == '*') {\n                    dp[s_p][p_p] = (dp[s_p][p_p-2]) || dp[s_p][p_p-1] || dp[s_p-1][p_p-1];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        /*\n        cout << endl << endl;\n        for (auto v : dp) {\n            for (bool b : v) cout << b << ' ';\n            cout << endl;\n        }\n        */\n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"regular-expression-matching"}
